media.headline: Castro cuts down Gordon for DP
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Castro nabs Gordon after Santiago K's Castro
media.bigblurb: Hector Santiago strikes out Mike Moustakas and Jason Castro throws out Alex Gordon at second for a double play in the top of the 1st

media.headline: Escobar's RBI single
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Escobar scores Sano with an RBI single
media.bigblurb: Eduardo Escobar hits a single up the middle to score Miguel Sano from second for the first Twins' run of the game in the bottom of the 2nd

media.headline: Rosario's RBI single
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Rosario plates Castro with an RBI single
media.bigblurb: Eddie Rosario hits a single up the middle to score Jason Castro, extending the Twins' lead to 2-0 in the bottom of the 2nd

media.headline: Dozier's RBI forceout
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Dozier plates Escobar on an RBI forceout
media.bigblurb: Brian Dozier grounds into a forceout, allowing Eduardo Escobar to score from third to extend the Twins' lead to 3-0

media.headline: Fan robs ball from kid's path
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Fan reaches in front of a kid for a foul ball
media.bigblurb: A Twins fans reaches in front of a kid's glove to catch Joe Mauer's foul ball on one hop and winds up giving the ball to a different kid

media.headline: Orlando's RBI single
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Orlando plates Royals' first run with single
media.bigblurb: Paulo Orlando knocks a single to shallow left field and Lorenzo Cain comes home to score the Royals' first run of the game in the 4th

media.headline: Dozier's superb stop, throw
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Dozier slides, hops to nab Gordon at first
media.bigblurb: Brian Dozier makes a sliding stop on Alex Gordon's ground ball, hops up and flings it to first for the final out in the top of the 5th

media.headline: Fan's catch with purse in hand
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Fan snags foul ball with purse in other hand
media.bigblurb: A multitasking Twins fan snags a foul ball with his glove while holding a purse in the other hand, all while protecting a woman next to him

media.headline: Sano's bases-clearing triple
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Sano clears bases with a triple off the wall
media.bigblurb: With the bases loaded, Miguel Sano crushes a shot off the wall in right-center to bring home three runs and extend the Twins' lead to 6-1

media.headline: Escobar's three-run homer
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Escobar plates three with homer to left
media.bigblurb: Eduardo Escobar launches a shot over the wall in left-center field to bring home three runs and extend the Twins' lead to 9-1 in the 7th

media.headline: Hosmer's unassisted double play
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Hosmer makes bobble catch, doubles off Castro
media.bigblurb: Eric Hosmer bobbles but catches a sharp line drive off the bat of Eduardo Escobar and steps on first to double off Jason Castro in the 6th

media.headline: Kennedy fans Mauer
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Kennedy strikes out Mauer in the 2nd
media.bigblurb: Ian Kennedy gets Joe Mauer looking at strike three for the first out in the bottom of the 2nd

media.headline: Santiago induces double play
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Twins turn two behind Santiago
media.bigblurb: Hector Santiago gets Cheslor Cuthbert to ground into an inning-ending 6-4-3 double play in the top of the 2nd

media.headline: Rogers fans Mondesi
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Rogers ends frame with nasty strikeout
media.bigblurb: Taylor Rogers gets Raul Mondesi to strike out on a nasty pitch for the final out in the top of the 7th

media.headline: Karns fans Grossman
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Karns K's Grossman in his Royals' debut
media.bigblurb: In his Royals debut, Nathan Karns gets Robbie Grossman looking at strike three for the first out in the bottom of the 7th

media.headline: Dozier's diving stop ends game
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Dozier cements victory with diving stop
media.bigblurb: Brian Dozier makes a diving stop on a sharply-hit ground ball by Paulo Orlando and throws to first for the final out of the game

media.headline: Santiago K's four in solid start
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Santiago strikes out four in a one-run effort
media.bigblurb: Hector Santiago strikes out four Royals in his first start of 2017, allowing one run, four hits and two walks in five-plus innings

media.headline: Escobar's excellent stop
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Escobar nabs Hosmer with stellar stop
media.bigblurb: Eduardo Escobar makes an excellent stop on Eric Hosmer's sharp grounder and uncorks a strong throw to first for the first out in the 9th

media.headline: Escobar on terrific day
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Escobar on great day at the plate in 9-1 win
media.bigblurb: Eduardo Escobar discusses his great performance against the Royals, hitting a three-run home run and playing great defense

media.headline: Sano's quick catch
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Sano snags Perez's scalding line drive
media.bigblurb: Miguel Sano catches a hard line drive off the bat of Salvador Perez for the final out in the top of the 6th

media.headline: Molitor on win over Royals
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Molitor discusses 9-1 win vs. Royals
media.bigblurb: Twins manager Paul Molitor discusses Hector Santiago's solid start, his bullpen adjusting to roles and keeping the Royals at bay

media.headline: Castro draws a walk
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Castro draws walk, moves Sano to second
media.bigblurb: Jason Castro draws a walk from Ian Kennedy, moving Miguel Sano into scoring position at second base in the bottom of the 2nd

media.headline: Sano on 9-1 win over Royals
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Sano on his bases-clearing triple, 9-1 win
media.bigblurb: Miguel Sano discusses his solid performance in the Twins 9-1 win over the Royals

media.headline: 4/5/17 CG: KC@MIN
media.blurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: KC@MIN:
media.bigblurb: 4/5/17 Condensed Game: KC@MIN:

media.headline: Haley's Major League debut
media.blurb: KC@MIN: Haley notches clean inning in MLB debut
media.bigblurb: Justin Haley pitches a 1-2-3 top of the 9th for the Twins in his Major League debut

media.headline: Recap: KC 1, MIN 9
media.blurb: 4/5/17: Escobar, Sano contribute in Twins' big win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Miguel Sano hit a three-run triple and Eduardo Escobar hit a three-run homer, while Hector Santiago struck out 4 in the 9-1 win
